1998 di el.ti.ti.ee. thrasthawadin nidahas swarna jayanthiya pawathwimata niyamithawa thibu mahanuwara dalada maligawata dawantha bomba praharayak ella karana lada awasthawedi el.ti.ti.ee. sanwidhanayata aadhara ekathu kirime kriyakarakam thahanam karana lesa bala karamin saha koti thrasthawadaya niyatha washayen parajayata path kala yuthuya yana aramuna mulikawa 'thrastha wirodhi jathika wyaparaya' pihitu wimata mulika wiya.
